lead_paragraph: Anschutz Entertainment Group has reached a preliminary agreement to sell its stake in the Chicago Fire to the Los Angeles-based Andell Holdings. Financial terms were not disclosed. In January, Anschutz sold another team, D.C. United, for a Major League Soccer-record $33 million.
